definition: cause to be in a certain state, the option to sell a given stock (or stock index or commodity future) at a given price before a given date
details:
verb
- cause to be in a certain state
- put into a certain place or abstract location
= synonyms: set, lay, position, place, pose
- adapt
= example: adapt
- cause someone to undergo something
= example: cause someone to undergo something
- make an investment
= synonyms: place, commit, invest
- estimate
= example: estimate
= synonyms: place, set
- arrange thoughts, ideas, temporal events
= synonyms: order, arrange, set up
- formulate in a particular style or language
= example: formulate in a particular style or language
= synonyms: cast
- attribute or give
= example: attribute or give
= synonyms: assign
noun
- the option to sell a given stock (or stock index or commodity future) at a given price before a given date
= synonyms: put option
